summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 JEEP PATRIOT. WHILE DRIVING 20 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING. OCCASIONALLY, THE VEHICLE FAILED TO START ON THE FIRST ATTEMPT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE DEALER AND MANUFACTURER WERE NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 38,000.
